Reviews.Title: Good entry level android phone
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: I have been a blackberry user for the past few years. I have had the bold 9000, torch 9810 and bold 9900. With all the hype about the android os, I decided to give it a try. I did not want to spend a lot of money on a galaxy or any of the expensive sets since I wasn't sure if I would like the os. While researching, I came across this phone and purchased it from OG Wireless.It arrived in a small box (original packaging) with the handset, charger and battery. I slipped in my sim and sd card and after downloading the configuration settings for my carrier, I was up and running. I tried calls and the quality is good. It connected to my home wifi with no problem and so far I have not been disappointed. Please bear in mind I am experimenting with android and have no knowledge of the system.I downloaded several apps from google play (after entering my gmail account info) and again encountered no problem. There is tabbed browsing which I like. It came preloaded with a ton of apps that I will have to sort through to figure out their usefulness. These include YouTube, google talk, google plus, email, samsung apps etc.The sleep/power button is on the right hand side, volume button on the left, earphone jack at the top. The back comes off with a little effort. I had to use a small nail file to prise it up.Whew! All in all, I have not been disappointed SO FAR. I am still getting used to the android os but the interface is very user friendly. Long and short, I have no hesitation recommending this phone if you want a cheap, basic android phone without the bells and whistles.Will update as time progresses.UPDATE 10/11/12 Battery life so far has been good. At 9 am the phone was 100% charged. After Wifi was on all day and chatting all day it is at 75% (9:57 pm). I should point out that I surfed for a bit and also used other apps but minimally. I primarily chatted. The phone has a covered micro or mini USB port at the top for charging and seemingly any charger with that end works. I tried it with my kindle and Bb chargers without problem.Concerning the preinstalled app, they apparently cannot be deleted. Oh joy lol but it's ok. So far I am still not disappointed. May upgrade later but it works fine for me for now. Wil update if necessary.

Reviews.Title: Such a Deal that I Feel Like I Stole It
Reviews.Author: Fly By Light
Reviews.Content: After checking out Unlocked Cellphone Kings on ebay and BBB (excellent ratings on both), I took the plunge.  The phone shipped quickly, and arrived in discrete packaging (Return address did not mention cell phones - good thinking!).  Contents:  phone, battery, charger (not US), adapter, quick start guide in English, and three manuals, none in English.  Setup was simple, quick and painless.  However, I don't have a data plan, so I worried about how to avoid unconscionable charges for accidental downloads.  The surprisingly hard-to-find .pdf manual in English (found at [...]-downloads) was very helpful with that and several other important issues (How do I answer the phone?  How do I hang up?  . . . )  After getting oriented, I discovered that this phone is jam-packed.  It compares pretty favorably with my kids twice-as-expensive Samsung Exhibit.  It has Gingerbread and works great with Google apps like Google Play and Google Drive.  It even has a hidden micro SD slot inside and GPS.Nothing's perfect and this is no exception.  First, I had some problems with Amazon's Android Appstore.  One Yahtzee clone and the store itself are glitchy.  Second, the phone is really tiny.  It makes reading and some apps tricky, but the keyboard is not hard to use.  It's only 3G, which is not a problem for me.  Some apps require earbuds, rather than the speaker (which is an observation, not a complaint).  And the battery life is nowhere near what is advertised, especially if you turn on networking, GPS, WiFi, . . .  None of these is a big problem - this is a tight, impressive little device and for just over $100, it's really kind of shocking how much you can do with it.

Reviews.Title: Phone is good but international model is causing issues
Reviews.Author: Rachel Williams "Rachel and Family"
Reviews.Content: I like this phone, its for my 13 year old son.  Everything works great except one thing.  The Access Point Settings needed set up to allow the data network for T-Mobile.  Internet was then working fine.  But everytime I change the MNC setting to 260 for T Mobile it wipes out all the other settings.  I was told my T-Mobile and Samsung that neither can help me because this is an international phone.  So basically now we cannot use MMS (picture messaging) on this phone.  THis is a big deal for him and if I knew this I would not have purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Android will kill the feature phone with this little gem
Reviews.Author: SunyJim
Reviews.Content: This is not a North American phone, they are sold in UK, Germany, India, Hong Kong.The phone is multiband GSM so works with GSM carriers (Rogers and Fido in Canada, T-Mobile and some others in USA)I bought this to replace a simple flip phone, that I use as a phone and sometimes to text. It's small, battery is good, screen is way bigger than my old KRZR K1, so I'm really happy. Wi-fi is fantastic bonus for Facebook, email, google messenger, etc when i'm at home or at the coffee shop. GPS works great. Phone is fast and very responsive. Camera is just 2MP fixed focus, but takes good enough point and shoot pictures.If you are buying this for data, keep in mind it will do EDGE, but not 3G, this is a foreign market the 3G is HSDPA 900 / 2100. It uses different frequencies than North America for 3G (hardware based, not changeable) so that doesn't work here.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Samsung world phone
Reviews.Author: Rosewood
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone, it came on time and works perfectly. It does everything I want it to do, plus it takes great pictures, which I didn't expect.

Reviews.Title: good starter phone.
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my teenager. Was her first smart phone. A good starter phone for teens or anyone who want to get their feet wet when it comes to the android market. The phone is 3G speed on GSM networks such as At&t.; It will work for net 10, as well as straight talk.

Reviews.Title: Phone is Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: rObz
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for hubby last christmas and he loves his new smartphone. Plenty of application and it is wifi.

Reviews.Title: Very good entry level phone
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good Android phone at lower cost then this is the one. Looks very nice, good fast touch and feature packed phone. Just go for it.

Reviews.Title: Good cell phone!
Reviews.Author: rodolfo dan porreca
Reviews.Content: Incredible all functions included for this priceMay be the display is a little bit small, but the phone works well under Android

Reviews.Title: Could come with USB cable and earphones
Reviews.Author: Marcela
Reviews.Content: The phone is nice and small. Does what it is supposed to. The only thing I was not quite happy it doesn't come with USB cable nor earphones.

Reviews.Title: MEMORY MISSING
Reviews.Author: Janice Esdaille
Reviews.Content: it did not come with all the functions that it stated and the memory is smaller than previously stated. It came with 1.9GB instead of 3gb

Reviews.Title: nice little phone
Reviews.Author: Pavic
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and I bought the white model for myself and we are both pleased with them. The phone has an elegant design, it's easy to use, it is very light and nice. One thing that both my husband and I have a problem with is the sound gallery, in all honesty the ringtones are all a little weird. The other one is the charger - the charger in itself seems ok, but I've had problems problems with the travel adapter which looks very cheap. It simply refuses to make proper contact. Fortunately, my Kindle charger works with the phone, so I solved the problem. And at least we know that when I go to Europe, we will have a charger for my phone and my Kindle:)Anyway, I recommend the phone. You won't get a better deal for this price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Pocket S5300 Unlocked GSM Phone with 3G, Android 2.3 OS
Reviews.Author: valdas bator
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy Pocket S5300 Unlocked GSM Phone with 3G, Android 2.3 OS its good phone i like it , one thing wrong the charger in the box is Europe plug in to the wall outlet so you have to have your own.

Reviews.Title: Was good for my nine year old
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: It's great especially for a child. My son loved his first cell phone which was this. Would definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: smaaaaaaall
Reviews.Author: dreydnero
Reviews.Content: my fingers are attached to my adult body, so naturally this phone isnt comfy for me at all.self, stop being so frugal most times...

Reviews.Title: Great small phone
Reviews.Author: scb123
Reviews.Content: Small but efficient. I  only used it for 4 weeks. So far so good. It comes preloaded with several useful applications.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Carlson
Reviews.Content: I like it very much, the only thing it was just a little to small but it work pretty well.

Reviews.Title: Look, I'm not going to say your iPhone sucks
Reviews.Author: PATRICK DIJUSTO
Reviews.Content: After all, you may be very happy with your iPhone.  Who am I to tell you to get a different phone?All I can say is that I've had an iPhone, and I've had this phone, and I'm never going back to an iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Good little phone
Reviews.Author: S. A. Miller
Reviews.Content: Some have said this is a good starter phone for a teen. I'm old enough to be the father of these teens, but it does everything I want it to. I like the small size. It slides nicely into my jeans pocket. Overall, I'm pleased with it.I saw from other ratings that people got phones in languages other than English. I spent a few more dollars and ordered directly from Amazon to avoid that problem. The packaging came with a recycle bag to ship my old phone for free anywhere in Australia. The date on the phone is in day-month format and apparently can't be changed. But someone knew he was shipping to an American, because the recharger came with an adapter for an American plug. I'm satisfied with that. (As an aside, this works out for me, because I will most likely use the phone in Australia, and now I don't have to buy an adapter.)Some have complained about needing to double-tap to reach the keypad. The actual sequence is: 1) tap the power button to activate the screen, 2) tap twice to unlock it, 3) tap to select the key pad. This is a little bit of a nuisance, and the biggest reason I took off a star. However, after a few days of using the phone, it has almost become habit.The smaller screen size makes the keys a little hard to hit, too, but I never did a lot of texting to begin with. I think I'll get the hang of it with a little practice. I haven't learned to swipe yet.The camera seems adequate but I'll need to see more photos to know for sure.In short, the phone does what I need it to: minimal calling and texting, with some occasional photos, with the capability for international use. If I wanted it to do more, I'd get a more expensive phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice Entry Level Phone
Reviews.Author: Beabea
Reviews.Content: This phone is about 4 inches by 2.5 inches with a screen that is around 2.75 inches diagonally.  Compared to the expensive phones, this seems pretty small.  That said, for around one hundred fifteen dollars, it is a good value.  I have T-Mobile and broke my previous phone.  I inserted my SIM card into this phone and it works fine.  I live in the US.  The charger is made for some European standard, but it came with an Adapter so it can fit into a US outlet.  The camera is 2MP which is fine for taking the occasional cell phone photo.  It also has GPS and a FM radio.  Overall, for the price this is a good value.  My only complaint is that it did not come with a headset.

Reviews.Title: NOT TO MY SATISFACTION
Reviews.Author: jacob appau
Reviews.Content: It wasn't up to my expectation. The picture looks better than the product. In the future let the picture be like the product

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: shingie
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived on time and easy to use. A little smaller than i thought but it works well and great low price

Reviews.Title: Phone is horrible
Reviews.Author: Heather's
Reviews.Content: Constantly resets and freezes often. Very slow. You will place a call and then have to wait 1-2 minutes for it to actually go through. S if you try many times it will then call a ton of times in a row ever time you hang up it will continuing to call as many times as you put it through. Unfortunately I'm horrible at returning crap to amazon and I had no other phone so pretty much my usage went down by more than 1/2, I'd just use husbands lol. I have yet to purchase a hone on amazon that doesn't have the resetting issue. Now I'll only shop through Walmart store or straight talk online for a phone

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: ac123
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter. She loves it. It is very easy to use. The signal level is very high.

Reviews.Title: very good team
Reviews.Author: Americo Rodriguez SEF-0189
Reviews.Content: very good team delivery was timely in perfect condition the equipment is new all in perfect condition and I am very happy with good camera equipment has

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Terry Smith
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the phones. I had to get use to the phones with touch screen. I think they should come with a user manual.

Reviews.Title: a Lemon - as we say in the automobile business.  Not a good phone
Reviews.Author: betilu
Reviews.Content: Ringer too low to hear, takes too long to open for operation, cannot hear voices in calls.  Slow, bad sound system

Reviews.Title: Just what I'm looking for.
Reviews.Author: tomentou
Reviews.Content: I really love this unlocked GSM phone,work perfectly with my carrier. The features are really amazing. Try it, you will never regret you did.

Reviews.Title: its a very nice small phone
Reviews.Author: marvin
Reviews.Content: well its a very nice phone for people who love small phones/...i liked it but the only thing it was just a little too small for me..but its a very nice phone for people who love small phones..

Reviews.Title: small size
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: it works great but I am disappointed by its size.. it is very small..i couldn't tell from the picture until i received it.

Reviews.Title: Very Good!!
Reviews.Author: R. Flores
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! the phone meets all expectations, recommended. little practical, quick access to applications, ample memory to download whatever you want.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: jenalleynf
Reviews.Content: My daughter very happy on her new phone she download more song she like and good fit to her pocket...she have the samsung galaxy player its so big for her and she lost it she use it for 1 month only and lost :/ so we decide choose small only...then i buy this samsung galaxy pocket..really satisfied :) thanks for this samsung!! Love it though i wanna buymine samsung galaxy 3 s mini later

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Pocket S5302 Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Stanley Shufflebarger
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is just the right size to carry in a pocket. It does the things I wanted it to do. Excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: SCOTT PROPST "Scopro"
Reviews.Content: Works great. Does what I need. Using as music player with Google Play with 32G microSD card. Use Skype via WiFi.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: lyn
Reviews.Content: Easy to take, but not good for game and browser because of the screen size.Made for Europe, mine is for Italy. But there is adaptor for US in the box.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: W. Peter Chmiel
Reviews.Content: Does most of what you would want a smart phone to do but at a fraction of the price. The screen is smaller than an Iphone etc but still acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Works nicely!!
Reviews.Author: Verona Myers
Reviews.Content: This was an experiment with a small phones that will fit in my pocket, but will do the things I need on the road. This phone was just perfect!!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Ana Izzo
Reviews.Content: todo perfecto me encanto todo muy responsables producto de mucha calidad..contenta por todo el servicio prestado.Aakdfnasfnas askdasfkn aksdfn

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price
Reviews.Author: Chico
Reviews.Content: Despite its low screen colors number it has all basic features that you could expect and the processor is considerably fast considering the general use purpose.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Rick Colwell
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and was as advertised.  Was easy to set up and use my account and then switch to my wifes account.  Poor camera but I didn't expect much from it.  Worked well as a world phone.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone
Reviews.Author: Adams
Reviews.Content: This was a good buy. I downloaded kindle so i can read books on my phone wherever i go. The phone is just the right size, not too big or small.Update on the Phone: Bought this phone in January and in the month of May the phone started giving trouble. User fault not kernel panic upload mode and *#9900# came up on the phone and the same problem keep on occurring or the android man will be on the screen and only when i take out the battery and restart the phone it will go away. The phone doesn't stay on so i miss all my important calls and messages. I contacted the seller they recommended something and it didn't work, i told them that and they never responded only to return a week after and tell me that i have passed the 30 day return policy so the phone cannot be returned and to contact Samsung. I know definitely i wouldn't be buying anything from this seller again.2nd Update  An Amazon representative helped me file the A to Z guarantee claim and it took 2 weeks for the guarantee support team to inform me that my claim has been denied and to file an appeal which was also denied. If this was there policy why did the representative help me file the claim? The reason it was denied was because i did not contact the seller within 14 days of receipt to report the issue or return the item within 30 days of receipt. I received the phone 30th January 2013  and it started to give trouble in May 2013 so i don't  know how i can send it back 14 days after receiving it when it started to give trouble 4 months after receiving it. This situation surely taught me a lesson about buying electronics from a seller on AMAZON. Can someone recommend another site where i can so shop.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Divine Nketi
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for some one, and the person tells me she luv's it very much. Will definatly recommend for any person.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG GALAXY POCKET S5300
Reviews.Author: Thomas H Julias
Reviews.Content: It's great! This was a good buy I recommend it for anyone on a tight budget and a good rleiable phone!

Reviews.Title: change battery time and everithing it ll be ok
Reviews.Author: tito "TITO"
Reviews.Content: i like it, i just would like a better batery and all funtions depend on internet, it makes me spend a lot of money cause no allways is there wi fi near.

Reviews.Title: it's good enough for my 8 year old son
Reviews.Author: TruDIva4Eva
Reviews.Content: Got this device for my son. He likes it. Some apps in the play store are not compatible with the phone so that sucks. It doesn't show the true network signal so don't know when it's in 3G. It's good for a kid, not an adult.

Reviews.Title: The description was not exactly
Reviews.Author: leo
Reviews.Content: The product was new and in perfect condition but the description is poor, it doesn't even have the micro usb cable which is SO important when you get a Smartphone!!! Don't like it so much!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Product and Seller
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Would not recommend this product or seller to anyone.  Ordered 2 phones, received one without charger, wrote seller 26 Apr and they contacted me May 8 and offered a $25.00 credit to my charge card and a new charger.  Today is June 6th, still no credit or charger.  BUYER BEWARE, DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER.  Poor customer service and no follow up on their promises.  Phone does not come with a users guide English so you are left to fend for yourself to figure out the phone in several languages other than English.  You would figure if you sell the phone in the US, you would furnish an instruction booklet in English with the product.  Thanks to this seller and a couple of others i will no longer purchase products from Amazon.  Out of the last several orders, only 2 have arrived without damaged, broken or missing components.  I had to purchase a charger from Dollar General to make up the missing charger.  I will be purchasing products from Walmart and Dollar General in the future and skip Amazon.  If they weed out some of these crooked sellers i may return at a later date.  My previous phone was a Samsung and worked great but after this latest fiasco with their products, they couldn't give me a phone for free.

Reviews.Title: speaker doesn't work
Reviews.Author: A. Ambeau "Bar10dress"
Reviews.Content: would have been nice to know that speaker doesn't work on the phone.  you can hear everything coming in and play music out loud and everything but no one can hear you talking. so, i guess you could say the receiver doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: seriously do not buy this phone.  it is too slow to download information because it is only on a european network.  trying to hang up the phone requires using the touch pad instead of a button to simply switch it over.  the phone screen times out mid conversation - so trying to use the key pad becomes having to flip on the screen, then having to double click unlock - and then using the touch pad.  if you are trying to drive and use any of these functions - it is terrible.  if you are on the phone with someplace that needs a code punched in - requires like three times.  plus talking on the phone is unpleasant and the speaker phone does not have enough volume.  less than a month in and i just want to break it.

Reviews.Title: Nice cell phone
Reviews.Author: Adriana Alvarez
Reviews.Content: It came on time. A good quality and nice size, an excellent price for a good cell phone. I love it

Reviews.Title: I Hate this seller----HE IS A FRAUD
Reviews.Author: Sreekanth
Reviews.Content: I hate this seller...please don't buy things from him..Unfortunately I ordered 2 cell phones from him....As a product this phone is good but this seller is not a genuine one.When I open one phone it was not working well and the charger was missing ...Then I contacted the seller and they told me to return the product..I returned the same and after around one month I haven't got any response from them(sent continuous mail)after that I got a mail from one SAM saying all the stuff like sorry n all...Finally I got one phone shipped to my address WITHOUT A BATTERY...I don't understand how these kind of peoplen sell their stuff through amazon..it will definitely affect the REPUTATION OF AMAZON...BEWARE WITH THIS SELLER

Reviews.Title: This phone just dies out, when i send a text.
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Sarver
Reviews.Content: Might be returning this phone real soon. Might be returning this phone real soon.  Might be returning this phone real soon.
